list_definition.definition: (also adjective) (of) the cut stalks of corn etc, having many uses, eg as bedding for cattle etc, making mats and other goods etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s a straw in your hair
Their offer isn’t worth a straw!

list_definition.definition: a paper or plastic tube through which to suck a drink into the mouth

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was sipping orange juice through a straw.
